x.name: pulse
x.text: The minimal rhythm consists of a sequence of steady pulses.

x-x.name: minimal shuffle
x-x.text: The only core beat with three steps.

xxx.name: waltz
xxx.text: Only recogniceable with an accent on the first beat.

x-xxx-.name: 3:2 polyrhythm
x-xxx-.text: A triplet `|x-x-x-|` over two notes `|x--x--|` results in this rhythm.

x--xx-x-.name: Ayoub
x--xx-x-.text:
Played as `|D--kD-T-|` on Darbuka in Arabian music.

Written in 2/4 meter

Source: <https://web.archive.org/web/20141026164509/http://www.maqamworld.com/rhythms/muwashahat1.html#ayyub>

Tresillo `|x--x--x-|` with the additional second beat.

x-x-x-x-.name: four on the floor
x-x-x-x-.text: When played in 4/4 on the bass drum.

x-xx-xx-.name: cinquillo
x-xx-xx-.text:
Also a common bell pattern.

Embellishment of tresillo `|x--x--x-|`.

Used in Biguine music.

x--xx-x-xx--.name: 4:3 polyrhythm
x--xx-x-xx--.text: A quadruplet (quartole) `||` over three notes results in this rhythm.

x-x-xx-x-x-x.name: Standard African Bell pattern
x-x-xx-x-x-x.text:
Usually written in 12/8 or 4/4 with trioles.

Many more bell patterns exist!

x--x------x---.name: Jhoomra
x--x------x---.text: The Jhoomra tala is divided into four Vibhag of length 3+4+3+4. The Vibhaga pattern `|x--x---_--x---|` (3-7-4) cannot be reduced.

x--xx--x--x-x-.text: Bass Drum playing 16th `|x--x---|`, Snare 8th `|--x---x|`, and ride (not included here) 4th `|xxxxxxx|`

x---x-------x---.name: Teental
x---x-------x---.text: The most common tala consists of 16 beats in in four equal divisions (Vibhag). The beginning of the first, second, and fourth Vibhagis stressed: `|x---x---_---x---|`. This can be reduced to `|xx-x|`.

x---x-x---x-x---.name: Shiko
x---x-x---x-x---.text:
Traditionally played on Ashiko drums.

Same as `|x-xx-xx-|` (cinquillo)

x--x--x---x--x--.name: bossa nova
x--x--x---x--x--.text: Like 2-3 son clave, the first part is `|x--x--x-|` tresillo.

x--x--x---x-x---.name: 3-2 son clave
x--x--x---x-x---.text: First part of it `|x--x--x-|` is tresillo.

x--xx--xx--xx--x.name: swing
x--xx--xx--xx--x.text:
two eights played with length 3-to-1.

There is a lot of room between shuffle `|x-xx-xx-xx-x|` and swing pattern.

x-x-xxx-xxxx-xx-.name: stadium clap
x-x-xxx-xxxx-xx-.text: Used in sports to cheer a team.

x-xx-xx-x-x-x-x-.name: Baqueteo
x-xx-xx-x-x-x-x-.text: Cinquillo `|x-xx-xx-|` followed by four unsyncopated notes.
